market_question: Will Donald Trump be inaugurated?

public_sources.name: Federal Election Commission Data Portal
public_sources.license: U.S. government work (public domain under 17 U.S.C. §105).
public_sources.access_notes: Includes committee- and candidate-level receipts, disbursements, and independent expenditure filings. Daily bulk CSV dumps allow reproducible merges.

public_sources.name: OpenSecrets Presidential Race Dashboard
public_sources.license: Creative Commons BY-NC 3.0; non-commercial redistribution with attribution.
public_sources.access_notes: Aggregated fundraising and outside spending totals; API requires free account and enforces non-commercial restrictions.

public_sources.name: ProPublica Campaign Finance API
public_sources.license: Free for non-commercial use; registration and attribution required.
public_sources.access_notes: Provides normalized FEC filings (Schedule A/B) with REST pagination for programmatic pulls.

commercial_sources.name: AdImpact Political Advertising Intelligence
commercial_sources.license: Commercial license; NDAs and seat fees required.
commercial_sources.access_notes: Creative spend and impression estimates for TV, CTV, and digital placements. Use to contextualize ad blitzes around market price swings.

commercial_sources.name: Kantar/CMAG Political Advertising Database
commercial_sources.access_notes: Legacy TV and radio ad tracking with flight dates. Useful for corroborating spend spikes.

timeline_alignment_guidance: Use FEC coverage_end_date to align quarterly and 48-hour filings with market price timestamps. After each report, forward-fill cumulative totals until the next filing to maintain daily continuity.
additional_notes: Pair presidential committee filings with joint fundraising committee data (e.g., Trump Save America, Biden Victory Fund) for completeness.

public_sources.license: Free for non-commercial use; registration and attribution required.
public_sources.access_notes: Provides normalized FEC filings (Schedule A/B) with REST pagination for programmatic pulls.

public_sources.name: Pennsylvania DOS Campaign Finance Reporting
public_sources.license: Official state portal; reuse permitted with attribution under Pennsylvania open records guidance.
public_sources.access_notes: Provides CSV exports of statewide and federal filings attributed to Pennsylvania committees with reporting-period timestamps.

public_sources.name: FollowTheMoney – Pennsylvania State Overview
public_sources.license: CC BY 4.0 with attribution; mirrors state filings.
public_sources.access_notes: Aggregated state-level receipts and independent expenditures, harmonized across election cycles.

commercial_sources.name: AdImpact Political Advertising Intelligence
commercial_sources.license: Commercial license; NDAs and seat fees required.
commercial_sources.access_notes: Creative spend and impression estimates for TV, CTV, and digital placements. Use to contextualize ad blitzes around market price swings.

commercial_sources.name: Kantar/CMAG Political Advertising Database
commercial_sources.access_notes: Legacy TV and radio ad tracking with flight dates. Useful for corroborating spend spikes.

commercial_sources.name: TargetSmart VoterBase + Finance Enhancements
commercial_sources.access_notes: Provides predictive donor scoring and near-real-time ingestion of Pennsylvania filings.

timeline_alignment_guidance: Pennsylvania filings follow pre-primary, pre-general, and 24-hour schedules. Normalize by converting each filing's reporting_period_end_date to UTC and aligning with matching market dates; forward-fill between filings.
additional_notes: Blend statewide filings with county-level late contribution notices for final 72-hour adjustments.

jurisdiction: United States – U.S. House of Representatives

public_sources.name: Federal Election Commission Data Portal
public_sources.license: U.S. government work (public domain under 17 U.S.C. §105).
public_sources.access_notes: Includes committee- and candidate-level receipts, disbursements, and independent expenditure filings. Daily bulk CSV dumps allow reproducible merges.

public_sources.license: Creative Commons BY-NC 3.0; non-commercial redistribution with attribution.

public_sources.name: ProPublica Campaign Finance API
public_sources.license: Free for non-commercial use; registration and attribution required.
public_sources.access_notes: Provides normalized FEC filings (Schedule A/B) with REST pagination for programmatic pulls.

public_sources.name: Clerk of the U.S. House – Financial Disclosure Reports
public_sources.license: U.S. government work (public domain).
public_sources.access_notes: Annual disclosures covering leadership PACs and personal finances of House members, complementing FEC filings.

commercial_sources.name: AdImpact Political Advertising Intelligence
commercial_sources.license: Commercial license; NDAs and seat fees required.
commercial_sources.access_notes: Creative spend and impression estimates for TV, CTV, and digital placements. Use to contextualize ad blitzes around market price swings.

commercial_sources.name: Kantar/CMAG Political Advertising Database
commercial_sources.access_notes: Legacy TV and radio ad tracking with flight dates. Useful for corroborating spend spikes.

commercial_sources.name: Quorum Federal Lobbying & PAC Contributions
commercial_sources.access_notes: Tracks leadership PAC receipts and corporate PAC activity tied to House leadership races.

timeline_alignment_guidance: Candidate committees file monthly; leadership PACs file semi-annually. Join on FEC committee ID, using filing_received_date to sync with market moves around leadership announcements.
additional_notes: Leadership races also hinge on NRCC/DCCC transfers; capture party committee filings for a holistic view.

commercial_sources.name: iPolitics INTEL Fundraising Tracker

commercial_sources.access_notes: Delivers synthesized finance and lobbying intelligence around Canadian federal races.

timeline_alignment_guidance: Elections Canada event returns include `ReportingPeriodEndDate`. Convert to UTC and align to the daily close in the price series. Supplement with interim leadership contestant filings as available.
additional_notes: Include Elections Canada event-specific expense reports once the writ is dropped for the 45th general election.

market_question: Will Nicolae Ciucă win the 2024 Romanian Presidential election?

public_sources.name: Autoritatea Electorală Permanentă – Portalul Financiar
public_sources.license: Romanian public sector data; reuse allowed with attribution under Law 544/2001, but interface remains Romanian-only.
public_sources.access_notes: Provides PDFs and XLS exports of income/expense statements by electoral period.

public_sources.access_notes: Civil-society aggregation of AEP disclosures with machine-readable timelines.

commercial_sources.access_notes: Includes harmonized election finance and public subsidy series for Romania.

timeline_alignment_guidance: AEP posts pre-campaign and campaign expenditure statements stamped with submission dates. Manual OCR may be required; align to submission_date to observe lagged effects on market prices.
additional_notes: AEP publishes reimbursements in PDF; plan for OCR or manual digitization to generate structured time series.

commercial_sources.access_notes: Provides capital-markets oriented election finance briefings for Central Europe.

timeline_alignment_guidance: PKW releases final committee statements approximately 3 months post-election. Align using report publication date, noting that intra-campaign finance transparency is limited.
additional_notes: PKW releases deposits and reimbursement schedules; interim fundraising transparency is limited.
